page.title: 13Events in Debenham.
page.content: An exciting event in 1985 has been the presence of BBC film crews.To quote the East Anglian Daily Times:- "Foresters Hall Antique Shop has been transformed from its usual sedate role as an antiques showroom to a busy, crowded auction room for the new series Â£Lovejoy'.Lovejoy is a lovable antiques dealer and the character will travel,in the series,through Suffolk and return from time to time to the Â£auction rooms' at Debenham when the plot requires it." The two top Junior classes from the Primary School had an exciting day when they took part in the Suffolk Schools History Project at Orford Castle in July.A day in the year 1173 was enacted,the children taking the part of apprentices.They practised several medieval skills,and saw their Head- master put in the pillory for theft.
